data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Gaming #9: Monstrous Humanoids & Outsiders (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This product contains over 225 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with software like Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales and/or software. The tokens are sorted and scaled into different size categories, and are convered to PNG files for optimal online use.

This token pack includes:
Angels
  • Planetar
  • Solar
  • Astral Deva

Demons
  • Maphistaloles
  • 3 Mariliths
  • Nalfeshnee
  • Paigoel
  • Prince
  • 2 Quasits
  • Retriever
  • Schir
  • Shoggti
  • Solesik
  • Soulkeeper
  • Succubus
  • 3 Vrocks
  • Alastor

  • Babau
  • 2 Balors

  • 3 Hezrou
  • Incubus

  • Locust Large

Released on June 01, 2004. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This product contains over 225 tokens in a base 70mm format (for Medium-sized) all converted and optimized for online gaming with software like Fantasy Ground. Produced by artist Claudio Pozas and Fiery Dragon Productions, these tokens are framed in a fiery border and can be resized for different map scales and/or software.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

data.legal_notice:
SmiteWorks Presents: Fiery Dragon's Counter Collection for Fantasy Grounds, owned by Fiery Dragon Productions, Inc. Used with permission, all rights reserved. (C)2009.

Fantasy Grounds is a trademark of SmiteWorks USA LLC. (C) 2017 SmiteWorks USA LLC. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED. Visit the Fantasy Grounds website for more product information.
